Name: Walk Mate
Tagline: Discover new walk paths while staying active.
Description: While fitness apps prioritize runners with advanced metrics, walkers have been overlooked. Walk Mate is the first iOS app built exclusively for walkers seeking variety and discovery. Its intelligent route generator creates fresh, circular paths daily, with safety first navigation that adapts to time of day. Set your preferred distance, rate your walks, and let the app learn your preferences. No more decision fatigue, just open WalkMate and rediscover your neighborhood one step at a time.

Name: Bean Recipe Adapt
Tagline: Tell Bean what to change and it updates recipe in realtime
Description: Tell Bean what's missing in the recipe and it adapts in real-time. Personalisation 100 Bean Recipe Adapt lets you fix boring dinners with one simple prompt. Craving less chicken and more veggies? Missing an ingredient? Just tell Bean and your recipe updates instantly‚Äîpersonalized to your dietary needs and taste preferences. No more recipe hunting or meal planning stress. Because life's too short for dinners nobody wants to eat. üçù

Name: Browser Use Skills
Tagline: Turn any website into an API in under 5 minutes
Description: Browser Use Skills lets you turn any website into a reusable API, no official API required. 1 prompt or 1 demonstration and we reverse-engineer the HTTP calls into a clean API. Need to download a song? Get 1000 posts in seconds? Generate songs on Suno? Pull videos from social media? Create leads in Salesforce?

Name: Proofly
Tagline: Private AI proofreading that runs 100% on your device
Topics: Chrome Extensions, Writing, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: Proofly is a free, open-source Chrome extension that gives you industry-class proofreading without sending a single word to the cloud. Powered by Chrome‚Äôs built-in on-device AI, it underlines issues as you type and fixes spelling, grammar, punctuation and more ‚Äì all locally. No accounts, no tracking, works offline, and a lightweight, non-invasive UI that respects your page, your focus and your privacy.

Name: Linkie
Tagline: Your link-in-bio platform
Description: Most link-in-bios are static lists. Linkie is context-aware. üß† Smart Components: Our Music player auto-routes listeners to their preferred app (Spotify/Apple) and Smart Links detect iOS vs. Android devices. üé® Total Freedom: Customize every color, font, and gradient‚Äîno rigid templates. ‚ö° Speed: Built on Next.js 14 for instant loading and better SEO. üìä Privacy: Detailed, GDPR-compliant analytics included.

Name: Ariel
Tagline: Turn your booking emails into travel itineraries
Description: Meet Ariel, Roamcalm‚Äôs new conversational AI travel planner. Don't just get a static plan, chat with Ariel to tweak your itinerary naturally, just like texting a friend. We also added your #1 request: you can finally split bills with friends without forcing them to create accounts first. As soon as they create an account, they are auto-joined to the trip and everything syncs up. Plus, shared checklists and a new floating mini-calendar to keep things organized.

Name: Haven
Tagline: Start with Haven. Bank with Confidence
Description: Haven is a safer way to bank online. Unlike open browsers, Haven only connects you to verified bank websites, blocking fake links, phishing pages, and hidden extensions. With Pre-Flight Checks and Verified Search, you always know you‚Äôre in the right place before you log in. It‚Äôs a calmer, more secure way to manage your money online.

Name: Eureka
Tagline: Turn any knowledge into an explorable visual map, AI-powered
Description: Eureka is an AI-powered visual knowledge exploration platform that transforms traditional linear reading into an infinitely expandable knowledge graph. Upload a PDF, or simply enter a topic, and watch as Eureka automatically generates a beautiful, interactive knowledge map. Unlike traditional search results, knowledge in Eureka is visualized as connected nodes, timelines, and concept trees‚Äîmaking complex information easier to understand and remember.

Name: Cravit
Tagline: Discover new places through food missions with friends
Description: Cravit is a new way to explore food with friends. Create your ‚ÄúCravies,‚Äù define what matters to you, add the spots you‚Äôre curious about, and turn them into small food missions. Visit, review, and see which places rise to the top of your shared leaderboard. It makes choosing where to eat simple, social, and exciting ‚Äî transforming everyday meals into adventures worth remembering.

Name: SpendLog
Tagline: See exactly what you bought, not just what you spent.
Description: Stop settling for just the "Total Amount." SpendLog extracts every single line item with near 100% accuracy. Track warranties, export clean Excel data, auto-categorize expenses, and even generate cooking recipes from your grocery lists.

Name: TruGen AI
Tagline: Bringing AI to Life with Human-Like Video Agents.
Description: TruGen AI delivers hyper-realistic Video Agents that see, hear, remember, and act in real time - transforming conversations into natural, human-like interactions. Scalable, secure, and API-first, it adapts across industries and languages. Fast, secure and easy to integrate.

Name: ClipNotebook
Tagline: Free link organizer and shareable research playlists
Description: ClipNotebook gives you a simple way to save and group links without accounts or clutter. Each link becomes a visual card inside playlists you can share with one clean URL. What is new or different Most tools make saving links slow or hide context in long lists. ClipNotebook is instant. One saved URL holds your entire notebook. Visual cards make recall easier. Friends can import your playlists with one click. Fast. Calm. Free.

Name: deOptimize.me
Tagline: The world's first human-as-a-service to de-optimize AI text
Description: For Humans, By Humans! Deoptimize.me is the world's first human-as-a-service to de-optimize AI text...

Name: 144 Archetypes
Tagline: Discover your true self beyond 16 types.
Description: 16 Types x Enneagram = 144 Archetypes. üß† Dive deeper into your personality with this AI-powered tool. ‚ú® Key Features: ChatGPT Integration: Get a custom prompt to unravel your life story based on your results. Multilingual: Available in English, Japanese, and Korean. Built with v0: Created entirely by a non-engineer radio host using AI. Discover the true you beyond simple labels.

Name: Colority
Tagline: Extract colors from images
Topics: Design Tools, User Experience, Photo editing
Description: Colority turns image color extraction into a moment of delight, offering instant access to HEX, RGB, HSL, or Pantone values. Most tools treat color like data, but Colority presents them ‚Äì in a playful layout infused with fluid motion. Every micro-interaction is crafted to be tactile and satisfying. Colority is completely free, ad-free, and designed to make a simple utility feel extraordinary.

Name: Waymate - Step Counter
Tagline: A minimalist step tracker for daily walks
Description: A step counter that gets out of your way. See your daily steps, explore weekly and monthly trends, set optional goals. Syncs automatically with Apple Health. Your data never leaves your iPhone. That's the app.

Name: Pricing Analysis Tool
Tagline: Increase conversions fast
Description: Boost your sales and maximize revenue with our AI-powered pricing analysis tool. Identify optimal pricing strategies and increase your conversion rates.

Name: Sebastian - Vibe Coding
Tagline: Create full mobile apps from a simple prompt.
Description: Sebastian.run lets anyone build a complete mobile app using only a prompt. It generates the architecture, UI screens, logic, and an exportable build in minutes. Ideal for founders, makers, and product teams who need fast prototypes or full apps without coding.

Name: Z-Image-Edit
Tagline: Professional image editing and generation by Alibaba Tongyi
Description: Z-Image-Edit is a professional image editing platform powered by Alibaba Tongyi's Z-Image-Edit model. Experience Z-Image, Z-Image-Turbo, and Z-Image-Edit for AI-powered image generation and editing with bilingual support. This platform offers a seamless experience for users to create and manipulate images with unparalleled precision and speed, leveraging the power of natural language instructions.

Name: Anfani
Tagline: Find opportunities that perfectly fit your goals
Description: Find scholarships, grants, fellowships, internships, and career opportunities with AI-powered matching. Get deadline reminders and never miss application deadlines - all free.
